name: XOT
description:
What is XOT?

XOT is a CLI game that's is based on the rock, paper, scissors game.

This game was created to just be a casual waste of time.

How to play
  • Both you and the CPU start off with 3 HP
  • X beats T
  • T beats O
  • O beats X

If X is used against T, the T user will be stunned for 1 turn. If O is used against X, the O user will be healed by 1 HP. And if T is used against O, O user will take 1 HP of damage. If both use the same "card" the round will end in a draw.

After a "card" is played, it will not be available until the next turn.

Notes

This game wasn't made to be serious, just something to do for fun. If any bugs are found, please do report them and I will try my best to find the time to work on them. If there are any features you'd like to see in future updates (if any) I will consider adding them in.
